languages.text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).
languages.original_text: Когда союзник в бою получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, навигатор получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз (до максимального значения +25 к Воле).

traits.locale_text: Whenever a creature in combat gains an extra turn, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 bonus to Willpower until the end of combat.

Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. This effect stacks up to 5 times (up to +25 Willpower).

Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

languages.text: Когда союзник в бою получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, навигатор получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} до конца боя. Эффект суммируется до 5 раз (до максимального значения +25 к Воле).
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

traits.locale_text: Когда кто-либо в бою получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}}, навигатор получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 к Воле до конца боя.
Когда кто-либо в бою получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}}, навигатор получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +5 к Воле до конца боя.

languages.text: 每当盟友在战斗中获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}意志{/g}都会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}加值{/g}。此效果可以最多可叠加5次（即最高+25加值），持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

traits.locale_text: 每当盟友在战斗中获得{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}时，导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}意志{/g}都会获得+5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}加值{/g}。此效果可以最多可叠加5次（即最高+25加值），持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado en combate reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, el navegante gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulativa de +5 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} hasta el final del combate. Se acumula hasta 5 veces (hasta un máximo de +25 a la Voluntad).
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado en combate reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g}, el navegante gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulativa de +5 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} hasta el final del combate. Se acumula hasta 5 veces (hasta un máximo de +25 a la Voluntad).

languages.text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter im Kampf einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} erhält, erhält der Navigator bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Kann bis zu 5 Mal gestapelt werden (bis maximal +25 Willenskraft).
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter im Kampf einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} erhält, erhält der Navigator bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Kann bis zu 5 Mal gestapelt werden (bis maximal +25 Willenskraft).

Immer wenn ein Verbündeter im Kampf einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} erhält, erhält der Navigator bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Kann bis zu 5 Mal gestapelt werden (bis maximal +25 Willenskraft).

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} au combat, le navigateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable 5 fois (jusqu'à un maximum de +25 points de Force mentale).
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} au combat, le navigateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable 5 fois (jusqu'à un maximum de +25 points de Force mentale).

Chaque fois qu'un allié bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} au combat, le navigateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulatif de +5 à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Cumulable 5 fois (jusqu'à un maximum de +25 points de Volonté).

languages.text: 戦闘中に味方が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得したとき、航宙士は戦闘終了まで蓄積できる{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を5獲得する。最大5回までスタック可能（最大25WILまで）
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中に味方が{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を獲得したとき、航宙士は戦闘終了まで蓄積できる{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WIL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を5獲得する。最大5回までスタック可能（最大25WILまで）

languages.text: Çatışmadaki bir dost birim, her {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazandığında Rotacı {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliğine üst üste birikebilen +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. 5 kez üst üste birikebilir (maksimum +25 İrade).
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally in combat gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g}, the Navigator gains a stacking +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} until the end of combat. Stacks up to 5 times (up to a maximum of +25 Willpower).
